title: 이달의소녀탐구 #344 (LOONA TV #344)
members: Olivia Hye, Go Won, Chuu, Yves
summary:
0:02 -- They finished the day time shooting and they are about to start a night shoot.
They wish to sightsee a bit during the night.
0:14 -- Jumping transition as they are teleported in front of the Danube river (opposite to the Parliament).
Their photoshoot begins.
0:22 -- They hang out in the streets of Budapest admiring the scenery.
0:32 -- The first half shooting of the ends. Chuuwonnie are surprized that it has already been a day.
0:41 -- Olivia Hye: "The night is very nice~". Then the four recap the whole day and hope they shoot better the next day.
